films.detail: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family. When organized crime family patriarch, Vito Corleone barely survives an attempt on his life, his youngest son, Michael steps in to take care of the would-be killers, launching a campaign of bloody revenge.
films.character: Michael Corleone Played by Al Pacino, Tom Hagen Played by Robert Duvall, Kay Adams Corleone Played by Diane Keaton, Tom Hagen Played by Robert Duvall, (Santino) Sonny Corleone Played by James Caan, Fredo Corleone Played by John Cazale, Connie Corleone Rizzi Played by Talia Shire, Carlo Rizzi Played by Gianni Russo, Apollonia Corleone Played by Simonetta Stefanelli, Clemenza Played by Richard S. Castellano (1) and B. Kirby, Jr. (2), Tessio, Played by Abe Vigoda (1, 2) and John Aprea (2), Don Fanucci Played by Gaston Moschin, etc

films.detail: Following the death of District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman assumes responsibility for Dent’s crimes to protect the late attorney’s reputation and is subsequently hunted by the Gotham City Police Department. Eight years later, Batman encounters the mysterious Selina Kyle and the villainous Bane, a new terrorist leader who overwhelms Gotham’s finest. The Dark Knight resurfaces to protect a city that has branded him an enemy.
films.character: Christian Bale as Bruce Wayne, Gary Oldman as Commissioner Gordon,Tom Hardy as Bane, Joseph Gordon-Levitt as Blake, Anne Hathaway as Selina,Marion Cotillard as Miranda, Morgan Freeman as Fox. films.detail: Framed in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison, where he puts his accounting skills to work for an amoral warden. During his long stretch in prison, Dufresne comes to be admired by the other inmates — including an older prisoner named Red — for his integrity and unquenchable sense of hope.
